productOffer.title: Business Account
productOffer.accountDescription: Open another business account in CZK, EUR or USD

sections.title: Main benefits of business account
bullets:
Depending on the type of your account, you get free of charge:

  • electronic outgoing and incoming transactions,
  • instant payments,
  • SEPA payments,
  • withdrawals from Moneta MONEY Bank ATMs in the Czech Republic and abroad,
  • deposits through 186 MONETA Money Bank deposit machines.
Maintenance of a debit card in CZK

sections.title: Business Accounts in EUR or USD
bullets: Establishment and maintenance of a foreign currency account with electronic statements free of charge
Debit card in account currency for free

bullets.title: All electronic transactions are free of charge (outgoing and incoming transactions, instant payments, and SEPA transfers)
Unlimited ATM withdrawals in the Czech Republic and abroad, and the possibility to deposit cash in both our own and shared ATMs
Two debit cards and electronic statements in online banking at no charge
Smart services and partner discounts available directly in Smart Banka and Internet Banka
Favorable exchange rates in our Online Exchange platform
All electronic transactions free of charge (incoming, outgoing, instant and SEPA payments).
ATM withdrawals in a network of shared ATMs free of charge.
All electronic transactions free of charge (incoming, outgoing, instant and SEPA payments).
Unlimited ATM withdrawals in the Czech Republic and abroad, and the possibility to deposit cash in both our own and shared ATMs

The account includes a Business Premium card with additional services such as Komfort Travel Insurance and Personal Belongings and Payment Card Insurance, including membership in the Priority Pass program. Plus, two additional Business cards.
Smart services and discounts with our partners directly in Smart Banka and Internet Banka.
50% discount on international payments that are not included for free with the account
bullets.detail: You will pay lower fees for outgoing payments in EUR outside the EEA and payments in other currencies, as well as for incoming payments in EUR from countries outside the EEA and payments in other currencies.

bullets.title: Online currency exchange with exclusive rates
Open at no charge with no maintenance fees
With a debit card with no maintenance fees
Open at no charge with no maintenance fees
With a debit card with no maintenance fees

statementOffer.title: How often do you want us to send you account statements?
statementOffer.daily: Daily – if there is movement on the account
statementOffer.weekly: Weekly – if there is movement on the account

userDataCheck.title: Is this information correct?
userDataCheck.modalText: Please stop by at any of our branches to change your details.

cardTypeOffer.title: Would you like a physical or a virtual card?

virtual.title: Virtual card in your smartphone
virtual.description: Instead of a plastic physical card, you will be issued a virtual card. For payments and ATM withdrawals, just add it to your smartphone wallet.

plastic.title: Physical + virtual card
plastic.description: A regular physical plastic card as you know it. It can also be added to your smartphone wallet.

contact.adressTitle: Contact address to receive the physical card

cardTypeOffer.alert: Have you changed your shipping address? We will send the card to you as soon as possible. If you want to change your contact address, you can do it in Settings.

cardDesignOffer.title: Choose the look of your new card

taxResidency.customLabel: Where do you pay your taxes?
taxResidency.labelTooltip: If your income from all sources in the Czech Republic and from abroad is subject to taxation in the Czech Republic, you have tax residence in the Czech Republic.

additionalData.companyTurnoverTooltip: This is the total income (turnover) from your business for the past year. A rough estimate will suffice.
additionalData.profitLastYear: Your net income for the past year
additionalData.profitLastYearTooltip:
This is the net income (turnover after deducting expenses and after tax) from your business for the past year.
A rough estimate will suffice.
additionalData.houseHoldMonthlyIncomeTooltip:
This is the net monthly income from your business + other income of all household members.
A rough estimate will suffice.

invalidDic.title: Is Your DIČ/TIN entered correctly?
invalidDic.alert:
The tax identification number always begins with the two-letter code of the state in which the entity is registered.

TIN = Tax Identification Number used for tax purposes in the United States. Fixed TIN format : XXX-XX-XXXX

goToBranch.title: More information is required
goToBranch.content: Please visit one of our branches where we can finalize the application together.

scenes.busyLoader:
Just a moment,
we are checking everything

staticDocuments.title: Read the pre-contractual information and other documents
staticDocuments.alert: All documents can be found in Smart Banka and Internet Banka in the Documents section.

goToBranchModal.title: We can not continue without your consent
goToBranchModal.content: If you have any questions, we will be happy to answer them over the phone or in person at any of our branches.

plastic.title: Done! The account {accountNumber} has been opened.
plastic.content:
The account will be active no later than the following business day.

The debit card will be sent to: {address} . It is usually delivered within 5 business days, but it can be added to your smartphone wallet and used right away.

All important documents can be found in Smart Banka and Internet Banka under Documents.
plastic.alert: Do you want to create another account? Please log out and log in again to make sure everything goes as it should.

virtual.title: Done! The account {accountNumber} has been opened.
virtual.content:
The account will be active no later than the following business day.

It can be added to your smartphone wallet and used right away.

All important documents can be found in Smart Banka and Internet Banka under Documents.
virtual.alert: Do you want to create another account? Please log out and log in again to make sure everything goes as it should.

nextBusinessDay.title: We are almost done. Signing the Agreement may take some time on our end.
nextBusinessDay.content:
During business days it should not take more than a couple of hours. On the weekends it will take until Monday.

As soon as it is ready, you will be notified in Overview, the Agreement will be saved in ‘Documents’ and your Account will be activated.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience.

error.title: We are sorry, something went wrong
error.content: We can’t continue here but we will be happy to help you at one of our branches.
